title: OPL VODS - Not playing, says they are private
body:
Anyone else having this problem with the OPL VODS?

Clicking on any of the games it won't play just has a screen with static and says that I can't watch it because it's private...

replies.body:
Hi there!

They should all be available the morning after each night, so if they weren't something went wrong! 

Which games were they and is it ok now?
Just tested one and I can still access it. Is there any particular one you can't see or is it every one?
